verses.verse: וַיֹּ֧סֶף <S%H3254><s%> vai-Yo-sef Then again אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mah and her name קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> ke-tu-Rah. [was] Keturah

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led And she bare ל֗וֹ lo, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זִמְרָן֙ <S%H2175><s%> zim-Ran him Zimran וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יָקְשָׁ֔ן <S%H3370><s%> ya-ke-Shan, and Jokshan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מְדָ֖ן <S%H4091><s%> me-Dan and Medan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan; and Midian וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יִשְׁבָּ֖ק <S%H3435><s%> yish-Bak and Ishbak וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שֽׁוּחַ׃ <S%H7744><s%> Shu-ach. and Shuah

וְיָקְשָׁ֣ן <S%H3370><s%> ve-ya-ke-Shan And Jokshan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad, begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁבָ֖א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va Sheba וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דְּדָ֑ן <S%H1719><s%> de-Dan; and Dedan וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons דְדָ֔ן <S%H1719><s%> de-Dan, of Dedan הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become אַשּׁוּרִ֥ם <S%H805><s%> 'ash-shu-Rim were Asshurim וּלְטוּשִׁ֖ים <S%H3912><s%> u-le-tu-Shim and Letushim וּלְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3817><s%> u-le-'um-Mim. and Leummim

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <S%H5891><s%> 'ei-Fah Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H6081><s%> va-'E-fer and Epher וַחֲנֹ֔ךְ <S%H2585><s%> va-cha-Noch, and Hanoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <S%H28><s%> va-'a-vi-Da' and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <S%H420><s%> ve-'el-da-'Ah; and Eldaah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All these [were] the children קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> ke-tu-Rah. of Keturah

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֖וֹ lo לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak. all that he had unto Isaac

וְלִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei But unto the sons הַפִּֽילַגְשִׁים֙ <S%H6370><s%> hap-pi-lag-Shim of the concubines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham, which Abraham נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham had Abraham מַתָּנֹ֑ת <S%H4979><s%> mat-ta-Not; gifts וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֞ם <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chem and sent them away מֵעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak from Isaac בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son בְּעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> be-'o-Den-nu was still חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> Chai, while he yet lived קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah eastward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz country קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem. unto the east

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, These יְמֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei And these [are] the days שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8141><s%> she-nei- of the years חַיֵּ֥י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei life אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> Chai; age מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im and seventy-five שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh fif שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַיִּגְוַ֨ע <S%H1478><s%> vai-yig-Va' gave up the ghost וַיָּ֧מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot and died אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Then Abraham בְּשֵׂיבָ֥ה <S%H7872><s%> be-sei-Vah old age טוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah in a good זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2205><s%> za-Ken an old man וְשָׂבֵ֑עַ <S%H7649><s%> ve-sa-Ve-a'; and full וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'A-sef [of years] and was gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mav. to his people

וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru buried אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> ve-yish-ma-'eL and Ishmael בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, And his sons אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> me-'a-Rat him in the cave הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <S%H4375><s%> ham-mach-pe-Lah; of Machpelah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in שְׂדֵ֞ה <S%H7704><s%> se-Deh in the field עֶפְרֹ֤ן <S%H6085><s%> 'ef-Ron of Ephron בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צֹ֙חַר֙ <S%H6714><s%> tzo-char of Zohar הַֽחִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti, the Hittite אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei which [is] before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <S%H4471><s%> mam-Re. Mamre

הַשָּׂדֶ֛ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh The field אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which קָנָ֥ה <S%H7069><s%> ka-Nah purchased אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham which Abraham מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons חֵ֑ת <S%H2845><s%> Chet; of Heth שָׁ֛מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there קֻבַּ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> kub-Bar buried אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham there was Abraham וְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> ve-sa-Rah and Sarah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> ish-To. his wife

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei And it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> Mot the death אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, of Abraham וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him that God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No; his son וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwelt יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, and Isaac עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- by בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er לַחַ֖י la-Chai רֹאִֽי׃ <S%H883><s%> ro-'I. the well Lahairoi ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these תֹּלְדֹ֥ת <S%H8435><s%> to-le-Dot Now these [are] the generations יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El of Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; Abraham's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָלְדָ֜ה <S%H3205><s%> yal-Dah bare הָגָ֧ר <S%H1904><s%> ha-Gar whom Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rit the Egyptian שִׁפְחַ֥ת <S%H8198><s%> shif-Chat handmaid שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah Sarah's לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham. unto Abraham

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, and these שְׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-moT And these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El, of Ishmael בִּשְׁמֹתָ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> bish-mo-Tam by their names לְתוֹלְדֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> le-tol-do-Tam; according to their generations בְּכֹ֤ר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'eL of Ishmael נְבָיֹ֔ת <S%H5032><s%> ne-va-Yot, Nebajoth וְקֵדָ֥ר <S%H6938><s%> ve-ke-Dar and Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <S%H110><s%> ve-'ad-be-'El and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <S%H4017><s%> u-miv-Sam. and Mibsam
וּמִשְׁמָ֥ע <S%H4927><s%> u-mish-Ma' And Mishma וְדוּמָ֖ה <S%H1746><s%> ve-du-Mah and Dumah וּמַשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H4854><s%> u-mas-Sa. and Massa

חֲדַ֣ד <S%H2301><s%> cha-Dad Hadad וְתֵימָ֔א <S%H8485><s%> ve-tei-Ma, and Tema יְט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> ye-Tur Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> na-Fish Naphish וָקֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6929><s%> va-Ke-de-mah. and Kedemah

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, These שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei And these [are] the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei of the life יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El, of Ishmael מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וְשֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> ve-She-va' and seven שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim; years וַיִּגְוַ֣ע <S%H1478><s%> vai-yig-Va' and he gave up the ghost וַיָּ֔מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot, and died וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'A-sef and was gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mav. unto his people

[and] he died פ Peh
